00052 {
00053   // this method is called every time the main window recives a key event.
00054   // we then switch on the key value and set the camera in the GLWindow
00055   switch (_event->key())
00056   {
00057   case Qt::Key_Escape : QApplication::exit(EXIT_SUCCESS); break;
00058   case Qt::Key_W : glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_LINE); break;
00059   case Qt::Key_S : glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_FILL); break;
00060 
00061 
00062   default : break;
00063 
00064   }
